Primer of Ecology with R Preface

Primer of Ecology with R Hank Stevens 2020-08-30 Preface In spite of the presumptuous title, my goals for this book are modest. I wrote it as the manual I wish I had in graduate school, and a primer for our graduate course in Population and Community Ecology at Miami University.1 To install the latest version of the primer R package, install it directly from GitHub. To do this, install the devtools package, and then use this code: library(devtools) install_github("HankStevens/primer") Miami University is located in the Miami River valley in Oxford, Ohio, USA; the region is home to the Myaamia tribe that dwelled here prior to European occupation.↩︎
